explanation: [0-0] A man in a white T-shirt is sitting in front of a gray table with a red potato chip can on it. The man grabs the bottom of the can with his left hand and places his right hand on top. Behind him is a dark blue wall with a light brown door. A white paper is stuck on the door, with the word "TOILET" written on it and a downward pointing arrow below.

[0-8] The man in white takes out a burning potato chip from the can with his right hand. He blows on the chip, extinguishing the flame and releasing white smoke. He puts the chip in his mouth, chews, squints his eyes, and shakes his head. Then, he reaches into the can again with his right hand, but finds it stuck at the top. The man frowns and stares at the can with wide eyes. He then extends his right index finger and shows a happy expression. He holds the bottom of the can with his right hand and turns it upside down. He pats the bottom of the can with his left hand and finds only one chip left inside.

[8-17] The man in white shakes the can, picks up the chip, looks up with his eyes, then extends his left index finger, opens his mouth wide, and smiles. He then puts the can on the table and holds a wooden stick in his right hand, chewing on something. Then he takes out a white candy from his mouth with his left hand and puts it on top of the stick. He holds the stick with the candy on it in his right hand, reaches into the can, sticks the chip out, puts it in his mouth, and eats it.
